ps3.5:1.2: iriyāpathacariyā, āyatanacariyā, saticariyā, samādhicariyā, ñāṇacariyā, maggacariyā, patticariyā, lokatthacariyāti.
ps3.5:2.8: Lokatthacariyāti tathāgatesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu padese paccekabuddhesu padese sāvakesu.
ps3.5:3.8: Lokatthacariyā ca tathāgatānaṁ arahantānaṁ sammāsambuddhānaṁ padese paccekabuddhānaṁ padese sāvakānaṁ.
ps3.5:4.2_0: Adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena carati, upaṭṭhāpento satiyā carati,
ps3.5:4.2_1: avikkhepaṁ karonto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya carati, vijānanto viññāṇacariyāya
ps3.5:4.2_2: carati, evaṁ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti āyatanacariyāya carati, evaṁ paṭipanno
ps3.5:5.2_0: Dassanacariyā ca sammādiṭṭhiyā, abhiniropanacariyā ca sammāsaṅkappassa, pariggahacariyā
ps3.5:5.2_1: ca sammāvācāya, samuṭṭhānacariyā ca sammākammantassa, vodānacariyā ca sammāājīvassa,
ps3.5:5.2_2: paggahacariyā ca sammāvāyāmassa, upaṭṭhānacariyā ca sammāsatiyā, avikkhepacariyā ca sammāsamādhissa.
